channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Iowa election officials sued by 4 naturalized citizens who say their right to vote was harmed
item.description: Four Iowa voters and a Hispanic civil rights group are suing Iowaâ€™s top election official after he directed election workers to challenge the ballots of people who may be naturalized citizens.

item.title: Police seek suspect who shot and wounded state trooper in New York
item.description: Police are searching for a man who shot and wounded a New York state trooper on Long Island. State police say the shooting happened around 11:45 p.m. on the Southern State Parkway in West Hempstead.

item.title: Google Maps adds AI features to help users explore and navigate the world around them
item.description: Google Maps is heading down a new road steered by artificial intelligence. The shift announced Thursday will bring more of the revolutionary AI technology that Google already has been baking into its dominant search engine to the widely used digital maps service that the internet company launched ne
